title: Wait Events Summary / Bekleme Olayları Özeti
description: Monitors database wait events to identify performance bottlenecks and resource contention issues

queries.sql: SELECT WAIT_CLASS, EVENT, TOTAL_WAITS, TOTAL_TIMEOUTS, TIME_WAITED FROM V$SYSTEM_EVENT WHERE WAIT_CLASS != 'Idle' ORDER BY TIME_WAITED DESC

doc_hint: Identify top wait events by TIME_WAITED. Focus on User I/O, Concurrency, and System I/O classes. High lock waits indicate contention. Tune query or add resources as needed.
analysis_prompt: Report top wait events by total time waited. Group by wait class. Highlight any excessive lock waits or I/O waits. Recommend tuning priorities.
